comment: The Wraith is an excellent utility driver. I can do anything from really long, hyzer flip up shots to controlled distance.
Overall this is a great understable mid made by Dynamic Discs. If you like Trilogy plastic, and are looking for an understable midrange, this is definitly worth giving a shot.
The A1 is an awesome approach disc that is now a staple in my bag.
This is one of my favorite driving discs for those long tunnel shots.
I don't get the point of this disc. It is basically an Innova Shark, just with an overmold, and a crummily made one at that.
